title: What are the counterintuitive things one needs to know? - Quora

response.answer_text: Counterintuitive is not something you know but a skill you develop for finding solutions or answers. I see that as the ability and willingness to consider what should work and what seems to be the wrong way to approach a problem, but then have the judgement to make a decision. It is the ability to recognize when a course of action will not work that it is time to do the opposite, This has also been called thinking outside the box. Many years ago a B-52 was sent on a long distance training mission. When the mission was complete, conditions were not favorable to return to their base on the same route, so they continued on the heading they were flying and flew around the earth to their home base.
